ANHYT.IS.summary: Anadolu Hayat Emeklilik Anonim Sirketi provides group and individual private pension and life insurance products in Turkey and Turkish Republic of Northern Cyprus. It offers private pension products, such as youth pension plans, investment for future retirement plans, housewives and master pension plans, group retirement plans, and private pension plans for corporations, as well as private pension funds and reinsurance products. The company also offers individual and corporate life insurance products; and protection insurance products, such as comprehensive life insurance, illness insurance, credit protection insurance, life insurance, and personal accident insurance. It offers its services through its agents. The company was formerly known as Anadolu Hayat Sigorta A.S. and changed its name to Anadolu Hayat Emeklilik Anonim Sirketi in 2003. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey. Anadolu Hayat Emeklilik Anonim Sirketi operates as a subsidiary of TÃ¼rkiye Is Bankasi AS.
